#summary Format of description.txt.
#labels Phase-Support

== Format of description.txt ==
Line 1: Album title

Lines 2-n: Album description

*Album title* = What you want to show in the album list as the album title.

*Album description* = An optional description of the album that will be parsed by [http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax Markdown]. It can be as long as you like.

=== Example ===

_description.txt_
{{{
Sample gallery
This is a sample gallery that uses the images that come with [Windows](http://www.microsoft.com/).
}}}
